item.title: Welcome Danielle Westmark, our IPI Fellow!
item.dc:creator: Ariel Deardorff
item.description:
Danielle is a student in the Inter-professional Informationist (IPI) Program at Simmons University and will be working with Ariel and the Data Science team from Jan-May 2021 as part of her capstone project. Danielle is looking to build on her knowledge of research data management, data science, and reproducibility and ...

Read moreWelcome Danielle Westmark, our IPI Fellow!

item.title: Welcome to the Library Albert Lee!
item.dc:creator: Karla Lindquist
item.description:
On January 4 2021, Albert Lee joined the Library’s Data Science Initiative team as a Data Science Instructional Designer and Analyst. Please join the DSI team in welcoming Albert to UCSF and to the Library! Albert will be working with the DSI team two days per week. He will be ...

Read moreWelcome to the Library Albert Lee!

item.title: Please welcome Katie Keyser!
item.dc:creator: Susan Boone
item.description:
Katie’s joining the Collection Management unit as our Electronic Resources Specialist. She comes to us from UCB where she managed electronic books, databases, and journals. She will be our primary point person for analyzing and resolving access problems for electronic resources. She’s an avid quilter—her current project is a baby ...

Read morePlease welcome Katie Keyser!

item.title: We have a new AUL for Research and Learning
item.dc:creator: Chris Shaffer
item.description:
I am pleased to announce that Micquel Little has been appointed Associate University Librarian (AUL) for Research and Learning. She holds a BA and MLIS from the University of Pittsburgh and an MBA from St. John Fisher College. Micquel has substantial leadership experience and a contagious attitude for collaboration. Her ...

Read moreWe have a new AUL for Research and Learning

item.title: Welcome (again), Angelo!
item.dc:creator: Joanna Kang
item.description:
This intro is long overdue! Angelo joined the Data Science Initiative and the Bakar Institute part-time as an instructional designer back in September 2018 and re-joined UCSF full time earlier this year. His official title is aptly “Data Science Instructional Designer.” Here’s an intro directly from Angelo: “Hi I’m Angelo ...

item.title: Welcome Cat Lu!
item.dc:creator: Susan Boone
item.description:
I am very happy to introduce our new Metadata Analyst, Cat Lu. She will provide expertise and leadership in the development and implementation of metadata strategies to enhance the discoverability of Library resources. Cat was previously the Digital Projects and Metadata Librarian at the Science History Institute in Philadelphia. There ...

item.title: Welcome Karla Lindquist!
item.dc:creator: Ariel Deardorff
item.description:
I am excited to announce the arrival of Karla Lindquist, who is joining the Data Science Initiative team in the role of Scientific Lead.
